website_summaries.verdict: Lux's Kono is a fine thermostat, as long as you control it exclusively from the app or via voice commands.
pros: Alexa, Google Assistant and Siri voice commands work with the Lux Kono
The thermostat looks nice and comes in 11 color finishes
cons: It's tedious to have to adjust everything on the thermostat from a single knob

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with many routers and home network systems. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: This "Smart" thermostat was easy to install and looked great, however, I was unable to sync it with my home network. I wasted a lot of time attempting what should be a simple process. Technical support quickly determined that the product is not compatible with my rather common Fios router. They told me that there are several routers that Kono is not compatible with. Too bad so sad send it back. They said the company shows no interest in solving these issues. Don't waste your time with this dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J. Record

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat is not simple or intuitive. It doesn’t allow you to just simply control the temp. It will not allow you to select auxiliary heat. It requires that you program it.
customer_reviews.author: James Faith

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Ambient Temperature Sensor
customer_reviews.text: Sleek modern thermostat with a very nice app but the ambient temperature sensor does not work well. Previous reviews have also noted this and I can also confirm its true. There is as much as a 3-4 degree problem with it and tested against 3 other thermostats right next to it. My energy bill actually increased using thermostat compared to a non programmable unit. I didn’t give it a 1 star rating because the thermostat does work just not as well as you would think for $150.
customer_reviews.author: IceIceBoyer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what Lux says it will do
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, replacing an older Lux thermostat. The convenience of adjusting temperature from my iPhone or iPad is truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Lots of issues with the app used to control it
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product 5 stars if the app that is associated with it didn't crash on me over 100 times in one month, and I do have a verified compatible phone
customer_reviews.author: Arian Christianson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems good but it just didn’t work for me. I followed all the installation instructions still unable to connect it.
customer_reviews.author: MoH

customer_reviews.title: Don't. Buy. It.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems. Got it connected to the WiFi, then it dropped. Never got it to connect back, making the app absolutely useless. The temperature range is such an issue. Set it on 71 and you might freeze to death on Monday, set it on 71 and you might burn to death on Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Elegant design and great usability, I switched from the Honeywell Wifi Thermostat as it kept loosing wifi resection, the Kono has worked flawlessly thus far, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: schwein

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy..hard to install...and manual operation is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a time wasting piece of junk. Having installed Nests, Honeywell’s, and several others... the interface is poor, the manual controls are terrible and the Wi-Fi didn’t work with either of two very common routers. If you have any router security in place it’s a rubrics cube to get it to work. Also SSID must be broadcasting.. and ten other reasons why you should skip this one. A friend asked for help...we wound up pulling it back off the wall and getting a different manufacturers product for $100 more. It installed in less than 30 min. LUX is too glitchy to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler_MH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Smart thermostat, but not as good as Nest
customer_reviews.text: I got this for out home. I thought it would do a little more, and have more features than my google nest. This is a nice thermostat. It was pretty easy to install on my wall. The instructions are good and do a good job for even the simple home owner. The app is average at best. It does and ok job. Not as easy to understand as a Nest. The price is ok. The display is nice and works great with my heating and air. It is an attractive thermostat. Looks good on the wall. I just think the simplicity of the nest is better.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't incompatible with the wiring of the midcentury home I tried to install it in
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this a more thorough review, but even with a handiman's help, we could not get it installed and working in the midcentury home we were trying to do the install in. Furthermore, the instructions were super confusing... I thought it was just me until I brought in someone to help, but nope: even a pro couldn't get this to work. This might be ok for you if you live in a new home, but if you're in an older place... consider your options carefully. You may need to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Meadow Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Thermostat & highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Seamless install, looks great & easy to use. App does everything I need and I connected it to both my Google Assistant & Alexa. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Only works with certain systems. Too complicated
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. It won’t connect to WiFi. The wiring is a nightmare because it only works with certain systems. I tried to hook it up to my Heat Pump and it acted weird. It wouldn’t stop running, the WiFi connection was always cutting off. I wasted my money on this thermostat. Don’t make the same mistake I did .
customer_reviews.author: Dana C. Harris II

customer_reviews.title: Loving it.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can change the temperature in my house from anywhere that can get a phone signal! I purchased this unit off eBay and have been stoked about having it installed. When I got a new system in my apartment I just had the installer install this thermostat... It's been great so far. It was a pain in the ass to get it to sync up with my internet at first though.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking but Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a great device. Then came the software update. Now HORRIBLE! Caution!!! Read recent software reviews on Apple or Android, and you will see how bad it is. Everyone is complaining! I replaced mine with Nest units.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Check Amazon 1st for everything!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermostat. I did over pay for it at another store because i forgot i had an amazone account but even still its beautiful and has worked very well for me for the 8 months its been installed. I did have to jump a wore inside the air handler but the intructions helped me through that...
customer_reviews.author: john brewer

customer_reviews.title: very nice when working, but setup is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Physical installation is easy, but the interface is not friendly. Once it is integrated with Alexa, updating is easy enough. The unit looks really cool. But having tested this, I was very happy to go back to my Echo Bee. A much better device.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine
customer_reviews.text: This works fine and installation is relatively basic, I just prefer to go with the nest system. I have my house on only a few standards and try to keep it that way. Nest, ring, Amazon Echo.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea, but I simply couldn’t get it to work with my older hvac system.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBellBlue

product_meta.title: Kono KN-S-AMZ-004 Wifi Enabled Smart Thermostat, Works with Alexa and Apple Home Kit, Geofencing Capable, Black
product_meta.description:
Style:Kono ThermostatKono smart thermostat let's you personalize comfort, décor and savings. With its unique décor-snap covers, you can change the look of kono from its original Black stainless finish to your own style. Kono also features effortless savings and comfort with home & away aware, all from an easy to use "control from anywhere" Lux app. Kono. Make it easy on yourself to look smart.
benefits: 
-universal Wi-Fi thermostat
-app available for iOS and android
-easy use
-geofencing capabilities
-energy savings
-comparable with Google assistant
feature_bullets: SMART THERMOSTAT: The KONO Smart Thermostat uses the Cloud to work with major voice assistants including Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit
GEOFENCING: The KONO Smart has Home & Away Aware geofencing to automatically control your home comfort using proximity awareness
COST EFFECTIVE: Comes with a smart scheduling system to estimate utility costs
COMPATIBILITY: Use with forced air, gas, oil, electric furnaces (up to 2H/1C) and A/C units with "C" wire connection

APPS: Free IOS and Android apps are available for the Kono to assist with easy scheduling and remote access to adjust temperature, schedule and fan COMPONENTS: Includes Kono units, wall plate (5.5" W x 5.5" H) and installation hard ware

specifications.Included Components: Dry Wall Plugs,Mounting Hardware,Power Extender Kit,Trim Plate
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars54 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
